activities: Insituform Technologies, Inc. receives information from the EU/EEA and Switzerland relating to the following matters: management level bonuses; stock awards; succession planning; salary planning for senior managers; management of information technology systems; and expense reporting.
eucountries: Belgium, Denmark, France, Germany, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Spain, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: All employee data is covered by the Safe Harbor Framework.  Yes, the data includes manually processed data.
privacyprograms: Insituform Technologies, Inc. is not part of any privacy programs for Safe Harbor purposes.
recoursemech: The independent recourse mechanisms are the EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC).
